content.question: Stonehenge was initially created by a Neolithic culture that can best be described as

choices.label: a society of loosely connected groups of migratory hunter-gatherers
a society of early farmers who lived in nearby agricultural settlements
an urbanized society concentrated in fortified towns along an important trade route
a stratified society arranged around administrative centers inhabited by the elite

content.answer: a society of early farmers who lived in nearby agricultural settlements

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
